Rat Trap taps feverishly on the computer to try and get it to desist firing=
 on Perceptor, at the same time he was happy to know that Lord Elder had sa=
id something to Tucson Prime.  

"UGHH!  C'mon computer, if I say somethn's=
 okay, it's okay!  It ain't like I'm gonna bug ya with a virus!  Perceptor'=
s a pred but he's changn' sides!  Stupid piece of outdated hardware!  Well,=
 at least Lord Elder said somethn' ta Wheels, I don't wanna ever hear him t=
ry'n ta put his spark on the line ever again."

Quickstride and Night Shift=
 try to deal with Noctorro, but his prodding was getting on the Autobot's n=
erves more than anything else.

"Look, we're don' the best we can, and we r=
eally don't know what we're dealn' with here, this is completely alien ta a=
ll of us and you're gonna have ta show some patience." 

Quickstride snorts=
 and looks over to Noctorro.

"C'mon, give us some breathing room will ya?!=
  Geeze!."

Outside, Tucson Prime acknolwedges the readiness to come aboard=
.

"This is Tucson Prime to Lord Elder, I'm comming back to the Ark as you =
requested.  And let's see what the medics can do, if they need my help I'm =
here to give to them.  Perceptor, Talon, don't worry, you will not be losin=
g me any time soon, I assure you.  I wonder if I can get a link up with Rod=
imus remotely.  As an Autobot we should be able to com link with each other=
."

He attempts to connect with Rodimus's com link, hoping to get through t=
o him.

lt at the moment in favor of the

ooked at his scanner, "Agreed." he said, "We cannot place him

ge chamber yet, since we don't know what affect that could

an start cutting them away."

carefully." he said,

e things can still

 cut away the metallic

d carefully.
